thing-type.label: ESPHome Device
thing-type.description: ESP32 / ESP8266 device flashed with ESPHome. See esphome.io

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of the device

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: IP Port address of the device

parameter.name: server
parameter.label: ESPHome device server name
parameter.description: Used to verify that we're talking to the correct device

parameter.name: pingInterval
parameter.label: Ping interval in seconds
parameter.description: Seconds between sending ping requests to device to check if alive

parameter.name: maxPingTimeouts
parameter.label: Number of missed ping requests before deeming device unresponsive
parameter.description: Ie if pingInterval=10 and this value is 4, the binding will wait a total of 10*4 = 40 seconds before connection is assumed broken, and reconnect starts

parameter.name: logPrefix
parameter.label: Prefix to use in logging for this particular device. Defaults to Thing ID
parameter.description: Useful when debugging commnunication with a particular device (and you have many)
